verse: Therefore, thus says the Lord God,

header: New Heavens and a New Earth

verse: It will also come to pass that before they call, I will answer; and while they are still speaking, I will hear.
The wolf and the lamb will graze together, and the lion will eat straw like the ox; and dust will be the serpent’s food. They will do no evil or harm in all My holy mountain,” says the Lord.
